data.comment: 10554 spectators are following this match.
Today's referee, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin, has blown to start the match.
Throw-in Khimki.
In the minute 1, Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards the away team a throw-in.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 3, Throw-in high up the field for Krasnodar in Krasnodar.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Arshak Koryan for Khimki is back on the field again.
Arshak Koryan is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Krasnodar push forward at Krasnodar Stadium and Viktor Claesson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Khimki defence.
Krasnodar's Tonny Vilhena misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Free kick Krasnodar.
Ball safe as Khimki is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Important block from the Krasnodar defence as Aleksandr Troshechkin fires in a strike for Khimki.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Khimki.
Marcus Berg (Krasnodar) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 18, The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Krasnodar.
Dmitri Tikhiy (Khimki) has received a first yellow card.
Marcus Berg (Krasnodar) had a chance from the penalty spot but missed!
In the minute 19, Goal! Krasnodar have got their heads in front thanks to a Marcus Berg strike.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Krasnodar push upfield and Marcus Berg gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Khimki defence.
Krasnodar's Marcus Berg gets in a shot on goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Remy Cabella returns to the field for Krasnodar after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 23, The match at Krasnodar Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Remy Cabella, who is down injured.
In the minute 23, Goal! Krasnodar extend their lead to 2-0 through Viktor Claesson.
Free kick for Khimki in the half of Krasnodar.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 25, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Arshak Koryan puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 2-1.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
In the minute 29, Krasnodar's Remy Cabella gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 31, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a throw-in for Khimki, close to Krasnodar's area.
Corner awarded to Khimki.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Khimki's half.
In the minute 34, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Khimki have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 42, Arshak Koryan scores from the spot to level the match at 2-2.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Throw-in for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Khimki's half.
In the minute 45, 6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Krasnodar drive upfield and Marcus Berg gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Khimki defender.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Krasnodar's Marcus Berg breaks free at Krasnodar Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Khimki at Krasnodar Stadium.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Viktor Claesson scores to make it 3-2 at Krasnodar Stadium.
That's a fine assist from Remy Cabella.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 46, Nikolai Signevich is replacing Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki at Krasnodar Stadium.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 48, Krasnodar drive forward but Marcus Berg is judged offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kristoffer Olsson of Krasnodar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Great finish from Tonny Vilhena to give Krasnodar a 4-2 lead.
In the minute 52, Wanderson with an assist there.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marcus Berg for Krasnodar who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Marcus Berg has recovered and rejoins the match in Krasnodar.
In the minute 54, Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar drive forward through Tonny Vilhena. His shot is on target but it's saved.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
In the minute 58, Dmitri Gunko (Khimki) is making a second substitution, with Kamran Aliev replacing Artem Polyarus.
Krasnodar's Aleksandr Martynovich goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In Krasnodar Khimki attack through Nikolai Signevich. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 60, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Marcus Berg (Krasnodar) strikes at Krasnodar Stadium but his header is cleared.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
Goal! Remy Cabella extends Krasnodar's lead to 5-2.
In the minute 62, Viktor Claesson instrumental with a fine assist.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Krasnodar.
Kamran Aliev for Khimki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 67, Marcus Berg gets his shot on target but fails to score for Krasnodar.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 68, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kamran Aliev.
The home team have replaced Cristian Ramirez with Igor Smolnikov. This is the first substitution made today by Artur Olenin.
Krasnodar make their second substitution with Daniil Utkin replacing Remy Cabella.
In the minute 70, Kamran Aliev is back on the pitch.
Wanderson for Krasnodar drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Krasnodar are coming forward and Viktor Claesson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 71, Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin awards Khimki a goal kick.
Khimki needs to be cautious. Krasnodar have an attacking throw-in.
Wanderson of Krasnodar is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! Krasnodar extend their lead to 6-2 through Daniil Utkin.
Great play from Viktor Claesson to set up the goal.
In the minute 76, The home team replace Tonny Vilhena with Eduard Spertsyan.
Artur Olenin is making the team's fourth substitution at Krasnodar Stadium with Shapi Suleymanov replacing Viktor Claesson.
In the minute 77, Sergei Petrov of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Dmitri Gunko is making the team's third substitution at Krasnodar Stadium with Evgeni Gapon replacing Alesandr Lomovitskiy.
Wanderson (Krasnodar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 79, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maksim Kutovoy is on a sub for Marcus Berg for Krasnodar.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar attack through Maksim Kutovoy. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 80, Khimki have a goal kick.
Krasnodar pushes forward through Kristoffer Olsson, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 82, Igor Smolnikov for Krasnodar drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
Khimki are pushing forward but Brian Idowu's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 83, Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Daniil Kazantsev is replacing Islambek Kuat for the away team.
In the minute 85, Khimki make their fifth substitution with Ilya Kukharchuk replacing Daniil Kazantsev.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergei Sergeevich Lapochkin.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Krasnodar's Wanderson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Khimki defender.
Shapi Suleymanov puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 7-2.
In the minute 89, Great play from Kristoffer Olsson to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Free kick Krasnodar.
At Krasnodar Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 7-2.
